amendment.description: To require reports on the utilization of the National Guard and Reserves.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1842 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1842 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S12580-12581, S12590-12591; text CR S12580) To require reports on the utilization of the National Guard and Reserves.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1842 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1842 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
